author: Matt Larkin
description:
Dark Souls: Mother of Mourning offers fans of the games a brooding and atmospheric start to a new cycle of Flame and Dark. The comic, written by George Mann, illustrated by Maan House and published by Titan Comics, presents another of the innumerable Ages of Fire from the Dark Souls world. As in each of […]

The post REVIEW: Dark Souls: Mother of Mourning by George Mann appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Dark Souls: Mother of Mourning by George Mann
